name: Terminal Hacker (Udemy Course Project)
description:
This is just a super simple anagram game. 

Each "level" has five possible passwords, that will be mixed up before you guess. 

You can either type quit, close, or exit to end the game.

Alternatively, you can just close the browser tab.

I made this following a Udemy course from https://www.gamedev.tv/. 

Not meant to be anything serious, just a learning experience for myself.
